models_fit module

Script to fit vector borne disease models to data Instantiates VBDM (Vector Borne Disease Model) and fitting process given paramters from local_param_config.yaml and config.yaml configuration files.

Typical usage example:

python models_fit.py -c <absolute path to config.yaml> -d <disease name> -rm <if you want to run model with fit params> -f <if you want to plot model output against data> -sf <if you want to save that plot>

models_fit.fit()

Runs vector borne disease simulations.

Instaniates each disease from configuration file
